content: Q1. How can you apply for a Medicare card online?

options.text: C) Through the Department of Human Services

content: Q2. Which of the following can be used as both social media and messaging application?
Q3. What is myGov and what services does it provide?

options.text: A) MyGov is an online government service portal that provides access to a range of government services, including Medicare, Centrelink, and the Australian Taxation Office (ATO).
B) MyGov is an online social networking platform that connects people around the world.
C) MyGov is an online education platform that provides free courses on various subjects.

content: Q4. What are the benefits of linking your myGov account to your ATO account?

options.text: A) You can access and manage your payments and services in one place.
B) You can receive notifications and updates from ATO.

content: Q5. Can you use FaceTime on non-Apple devices?

options.text: A) Yes, you can use FaceTime on non-Apple devices.
B) No, FaceTime is only available on Apple devices.
C) FaceTime is available on non-Apple devices but with limited functionality.
